comments.body: Is it inevitable? It looks a little weird to me to have `GITHUB_ACTIONS` in this part.

It is weird .. I will take a fresh look tomorrow and see if there's a better way. To avoid such bandaid fix, we should basically make a fix like https://github.com/apache/spark/pull/12334 .. #12334 wasn't even a complete fix if I am not mistaken. At least I think It will need a big change ..
